product_name: Sierra Designs DriDown Better Down Vest - Men's
long_description: The men's superlight Sierra Designs DriDown(TM) Better Down Vest has 800-fill water-repellent down, short sleeves so it's warmer than a vest and packs down small for emergency warmth. Premium 800-fill-power down is extremely compressible and offers exceptional warmth for its weight. DriDown is natural down that is treated to stay drier longer, loft better and dry faster than untreated down. Durable water repellent finish on the glossy shell fabric helps snow and drizzle slide off. Stretch underarm panels give you mobility and venting. Deep half-zip provides easy on/off and single-pull hem drawcord seals in warmth. Superlight fabric, a trim fit and minimal features make the men's Sierra Designs DriDown Better Down Vest a compact emergency mid-layer.
short_description: The men's superlight Sierra Designs DriDown(TM) Better Down Vest has 800-fill water-repellent down, short sleeves so it's warmer than a vest and packs down small for emergency warmth.
